item.title: Install explorer
item.description: First, make sure that you have the chifra-core backend up and running, then run the application from a clone of the explorer repo. Before you begin ☑ Set up the trueblocks backend using the chifra installation instructions ☑ In a terminal window, run the command chifra serve Install Keep the chifra serve process running. Then, in a new terminal, run these commands: git clone git@github.com:TrueBlocks/trueblocks-explorer.git cd trueblocks-explorer cp .env.example .env yarn yarn develop Open your browser, and access the app from localhost:1234.
